summary: Two friends a concession stand at the foot of the Statue of Liberty. After the World Trade Center terrorist attack, each of their dreams go up in smoke and yet they must endure the effect the attacks has on their lives.
cast: Al Thompson|Kareem Savinon|Anny Mariano|Rayniel Rufino|Jarrett Alexander|Ephraim Benton|Laurence Blum|Erica Camarano|Jack Caruso|Tony Devon|Angel Dillemuth|Jack Fitz|Alice Goguen|Tom Greer|Jay Gutierrez|Andrew Hillmedo Jr.|Skai Jackson|Raquel Jordan|Fady Kerko|Christopher Maggi|Kevin McKelvey|Montserrat Mendez|Amauris Muñoz|Kristin Myles|Lila Blake Palmer|Femi Percy|Tobi Percy|Jessica Perez|Johnny Rivera|Amaurys Rodriguez|Mimi Rodriguez|Erica Ruiz|Anna Simpson|Tenisha Torres|Yixi Villar|Fly Williams III|Teresa Yenque|Marc C. Cancassi
title: Liberty Kid
